text: @elonmusk #COVID_19 @NASA @NASAStennis JERRY HAD THE VISION & BELIEVED THAT EVEYONE SHOULD BE ABLE TO HAVE A RESONATOR IN THEIR HOME - IT TAKES AWAY PAIN - ASK THE NASA GUY W/THE KNEE PAIN THAT DISAPPEARED IN 35 -37 MIN I BELIEVE HE TOLD ME - I KNEW THE CANCER PATIENT & GOT M. ALI THERE!
